Edges-Pathfinder Chronicler -- Male Human Heroic Pathfinder Chronicler
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d4 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/heavy armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Survival: (sma) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Healing: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/heavy armor or shield
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Gorum (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 14; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (9 points): Barbarian; Beast Bond; Danger Sense; Fleet-Footed; Pathfinder Chronicler II; Pathfinder Chronicler III; Pathfinder Chronicler; Steady Hands; Two-Weapon Fighting Hindrances: All Thumbs; Can't Swim; Greedy; Quirk Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Barbarian: Has Armor Restriction, Fast, and Rage features
Pathfinder Chronicler II: May use Epic Tales feature 1/session
Pathfinder Chronicler III: May use Call Down The Legends feature 1/wk
Pathfinder Chronicler: Has Pathfinding feature
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Enraged: Ignores 2 points of wound penalties and all fatigue penalties
Epic Tales: Allies hearing story during rest each gain 1 Benny
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Pathfinding: Increases travel speed to known locations by 10%; successful Smarts-2 discards Enemies card
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 5 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 10/+d8
Armor: None Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (2d8 R15" AP 2); Net (d0 R3"); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fast: +2 Pace
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Call Down The Legends: May summon 5 shades for 1 hr
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Fury: +1 Strength step; every attack must be a Wild Attack
Rage: Has Fury, Enraged, and Reckless Abandon features for 5 rd at will or when Shaken or wounded (Smarts neg); suffers 1 level of fatigue afterward until 1 hr rest
Reckless Abandon: Critical failure on attack hits random target or self
Steady Hands: No penalty for shot from unstable platform; reduces running shot penalty by 1
Two-Weapon Fighting: No multi-action penalty for melee attack with each hand
